subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: SAN JOSE, Calif., April 17 (AP) — Most of the Nashville Predators did not participate in an optional team skate Tuesday. Instead, they attended meetings and rested in their hotel after a tough night at the Shark Tank.
snippet: SAN JOSE, Calif., April 17 (AP) — Most of the Nashville Predators did not participate in an optional team skate Tuesday. Instead, they attended meetings and rested in their hotel after a tough night at the Shark Tank.
